title: Razer Viper Review - Their Best Gaming Mouse Yet?
description: The Razer Viper gaming mouse has been teased but now its finally in our hands! But with mice like the Glorious Model O and Logitech G Pro out there, can the ambidextrous Razer Viper win even with its higher price?
